title: BETTER THAN TAKEOUT - Taiwanese Popcorn Chicken
description:
Hi everyone, today we are making popcorn chicken. I am sure everybody loves these crunchy little chicken bits. What I am sharing today is a Taiwanese version. I will show you my secret on how to make the chicken extra crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.

失BUY MY WOK 
USA - https://amzn.to/39iHIWd
CANADA - https://www.amazon.ca/dp/B07RJ39JVL?ref=myi_title_dp 
AUSTRALIA - https://www.amazon.com.au/dp/B07RJ39JVL
EU (including UK)  - https://soupeduprecipes.com/carbon-steel-wok-with-flat-bottom/ (Note: Amazon pay is not suitable for EUR orders. Please use stripe to pay.)
Rest of the World - https://forms.gle/r2YBBgtZbCejToVk8

失PRINTABLE RECIPE - https://soupeduprecipes.com/taiwanese-popcorn-chicken/

失MY AMAZON INFLUENCER/AFFILIATE PAGE - https://www.amazon.com/shop/influencer-078efbf8 (I share ingredients and recommended products there)

失SUPPORT ME ON PATREON -  https://www.patreon.com/soupeduprecipes

失RELATED VIDEOS - 
SESAME CHICKEN -  https://youtu.be/C2CVlvSSFO4. 

失RECIPE - Note: The product links below are affiliate links. I may earn a commission if you purchase an item on a linked website within 24 hours.

INGREDIENTS FOR THE JIAO YAN (Chinese salt and pepper)
- 2 tbsp of Sichuan peppercorn [Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/2ZK6uWz]
- 1 tbsp of white pepper 
- 2 tbsp of salt

INGREDIENTS FOR THE POPCORN CHICKEN
- 500 grams of chicken breast
- 1 tbsp of soy sauce [Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/2YqP0Bx]
- 1 + 1/4 tsp of salt
- 3 cloves of garlic
- 1 tsp of ginger
- 1 tsp of five-spice powder [Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/2NMp65Y]
- a few shakes of onion powder
- 1 egg white
- 2 tbsp of all-purpose flour
- Orange juice from 1/4 of an orange (1.5-2 tbsp) 
- 1 cup of sweet potato starch (Amazon Link: https://amzn.to/2Wmaw84)
 
Others 
-  a hand full of basil leaves
- Chili flakes (optional)
- Few shakes of the salt and pepper that we made
